formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'StopMixMonitor' =-
[Synopsis] Stop recording a call through MixMonitor
[Description] StopMixMonitor()
Stops the audio recording that was started with a call to MixMonitor() on the current channel.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,7 +4,6 @@ Stop recording a call through MixMonitor
[Description] - StopMixMonitor() - + StopMixMonitor(): Stops the audio recording that was started with a call to MixMonitor() on the current channel.
